verses.text: Michtam of David. Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.
O my soul, thou hast said to the LORD, Thou artmy LORD: my goodness extendethnot to thee;
Butto the saints that arein the earth, and tothe excellent, in whom isall my delight.
Their sorrows shall be multiplied thathasten afteranother god: their drink-offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take their names into my lips.
The LORD isthe portion of my inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.
The lines have fallen to me in pleasant places; yes, I have a goodly heritage.
I will bless the LORD, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night season.
I have set the LORD always before me: because he isat my right hand, I shall not be moved.
Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.
For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thy Holy One to see corruption.
Thou wilt show me the path of life: in thy presence isfullness of joy; at thy right hand arepleasures for evermore.
